works.name: Weather Buddy
works.description: Weather Buddy is a straightforward React app, seamlessly integrating the OpenWeather API. Users effortlessly access real-time weather updates for any city, obtaining essential details like humidity, weather conditions, and wind speed. With its intuitive interface and concise presentation, staying informed about the weather has never been easier or more accessible.

works.name: LVease: Leave Management System
works.description: Optimize your leave management process with our intuitive Leave Management System. Seamlessly request, track, and manage leaves, enhancing HR efficiency and ensuring seamless workforce planning. Simplify leave administration, empowering your team to focus on strategic tasks while ensuring smooth operations and employee satisfaction.

works.name: Netflix Clone
works.description: A Netflix UI clone replicates Netflix's interface using HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity, allowing users to browse and view streaming content similarly to the original platform.
